datadog_integration_pagerduty.description: Provides a Datadog - PagerDuty integration resource. This can be used to create and manage the integration.

individual_services.description: Boolean to specify whether or not individual service objects specified by [datadog_integration_pagerduty_service_object](/docs/providers/datadog/r/integration_pagerduty_service_object.html

services.description: Array of PagerDuty service objects. **Deprecated** The `services` list is now deprecated in favour of [datadog_integration_pagerduty_service_object](/docs/providers/datadog/r/integration_pagerduty_service_object.html

subdomain.description: Your PagerDuty account’s personalized subdomain name.
